pages.title: Overview
pages.purpose: Introduce the ARC-89 ASA Metadata Registry, explaining its purpose, core features, and relationship to the Algorand blockchain and various ARC standards

page_notes.content: Pagination and size limits (table): MAX_METADATA_SIZE=30506, PAGE_SIZE=1007

pages.title: Architecture
pages.purpose: High-level architectural overview showing how the smart contract, SDK, and supporting systems interact

pages.title: System Components
pages.purpose: Detailed breakdown of the major system components: smart contract layer, SDK layer, and developer tools

pages.title: Data Flow and Lifecycle
pages.purpose: Explain how metadata flows through the system from creation to retrieval, including validation, storage, and retrieval paths

pages.title: Smart Contract
pages.purpose: Comprehensive documentation of the AsaMetadataRegistry smart contract implementation

pages.title: Contract Methods
pages.purpose: Complete reference for all smart contract methods (arc89_create_metadata, arc89_replace_metadata, etc.) with parameters, return values, and behavior

pages.title: Metadata Box Structure
pages.purpose: Detailed explanation of the box storage format, including header layout (51 bytes), body structure, and index offsets

pages.title: Validation and Compliance
pages.purpose: Explain ASA validation, manager authorization, ARC-3 compliance checking, and ARC-89 native validation

pages.title: Flag Management
pages.purpose: Document the reversible and irreversible flag system, including immutability enforcement and bit-level operations

pages.title: MBR Management
pages.purpose: Explain Minimum Balance Requirement calculations, payment handling, and refund mechanisms

pages.title: Hashing and Integrity
pages.purpose: Document the hierarchical hashing scheme (header hash, page hashes, metadata hash) and integrity verification

pages.title: Python SDK
pages.purpose: Overview of the Python SDK for interacting with the metadata registry

pages.title: Getting Started
pages.purpose: Quick start guide for installing and initializing the SDK, including AsaMetadataRegistry setup

pages.title: Data Models
pages.purpose: Reference for all data models: AssetMetadata, MetadataHeader, MetadataBody, MetadataFlags, AssetMetadataBox, etc.

pages.title: Reading Metadata
pages.purpose: Guide to using AsaMetadataRegistryRead, including BOX vs AVM sources, AUTO mode, and metadata retrieval methods

pages.title: Writing Metadata
pages.purpose: Guide to using AsaMetadataRegistryWrite for creating, updating, and deleting metadata, including WriteOptions and transaction composition

pages.title: Registry Configuration
pages.purpose: Explain RegistryConfig, RegistryParameters, network authorities, and registry initialization patterns

pages.title: ARC-90 URI Handling
pages.purpose: Document Arc90Uri parsing, construction, resolution from assets, and compliance fragments

pages.title: ARC Standards
pages.purpose: Comprehensive coverage of all ARC standards implemented or supported by the registry

pages.title: ARC-89 Specification
pages.purpose: Detailed explanation of the ARC-89 standard for metadata registry, including box-based storage and pagination

pages.title: ARC-90 URI Scheme
pages.purpose: Explain the ARC-90 URI format (algorand://netauth/app/ID?box=), network authorities, and URI construction

pages.title: ARC-3 NFT Metadata
pages.purpose: Document ARC-3 compliance validation, metadata schema requirements, and hash computation

pages.title: ARC-20 and ARC-62
pages.purpose: Explain support for ARC-20 (Smart ASA) and ARC-62 (Circulating Supply) via reversible flags

pages.title: Development Guide
pages.purpose: Complete guide for developers contributing to or extending the registry

pages.title: Project Setup
pages.purpose: Instructions for setting up the development environment, installing dependencies with Poetry, and AlgoKit setup

pages.title: Building Smart Contracts
pages.purpose: Guide to compiling smart contracts with PuyaPy, generating clients, and understanding the build process

pages.title: Testing
pages.purpose: Overview of the test suite, fixtures, factories, and testing utilities

pages.title: Deployment
pages.purpose: Instructions for deploying to LocalNet, TestNet, and MainNet, including environment configuration

pages.title: CI/CD Pipeline
pages.purpose: Document the GitHub Actions workflows for continuous integration and deployment

pages.title: Reference
pages.purpose: Technical reference materials including constants, enums, error codes, and low-level details
